name: Rotating Room
description:
A simple platformer with a twist.

GOAL => Get the apple

Use A and S to move left and right

Use W to jump

Use R to respawn

Use E to spin (only after level 5)

Made with EaselJS For Ludum Dare 37

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=44871
